ISSUE.TITLE: [CI] ForkIT testWithStatsSimple failing

[main] 3 failures in test testWithStatsSimple (13.6% fail rate in 22 executions) - [main] 2 failures in step part-3 (10.5% fail rate in 19 executions) - [main] 2 failures in pipeline elasticsearch-pull-request (10.5% fail rate in 19 executions) **Note:** This issue was created using new test triage automation.
